title: Photoshop CC For The Web
headline: Explore how to create and optimize images for any web project using Photoshop CC fundamentals in this free online course
description: Are you in graphic design, web development or photography? If you are, or in any related field, learn advanced Adobe Photoshop CC productivity techniques as a powerful tool in this free online course. Discover the fundamental design and optimization skills you need to create beautiful, fit-for-purpose web images along with the principles of colour schemes, image formats and other handy tips and tricks to get the most out of Photoshop CC.
courseDescription:
Photoshop CC is a must-have if you are doing any kind of online design or development. This popular, reliable and fast tool is very versatile because of the vast number of tools, options and functionalities. All of it can sometimes be overwhelming, even to a seasoned Photoshop professional and this easy-to-understand course discusses some common and not-so-common techniques that you can use in your web projects to create original web elements and process your graphic images quickly and efficiently. 

You will be taught some fantastic Photoshop CC features through engaging and practical video lectures where you will start by learning about the different kinds of images, colour spaces, and file formats. The process of setting up your images for the web, using the Image Size dialogue box is then covered along with some essential techniques to resize images for web and the role resolution plays. In the second part of the course, you will explore image optimization using the Save for the Web dialogue box which includes topics such as retina graphics, automation, creating droplets, batch processing, and image processing. The next piece of content takes a close look at some web styling techniques for buttons, headers, navigation menus, and generating assets.
